attributes.additional_details: When it was at £1 this year I could go further and use transport more but now increasing prices makes me not wanting to. It's part of living transport so stop making it so expensive
attributes.background: To make the economy work, lower prices so transport is cheaper to use.

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament don't decide directly on fuel prices. You could start a new petition calling for the tax on fuel to be reduced.
